io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.http

Class HttpFileDaemonServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.http.HttpFileDaemonServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpDaemon, ZipRequest, java.lang.Runnable

    public class HttpFileDaemonServer
extends java.lang.Thread
implements HttpDaemon, ZipRequest
    The main daemon used for hosting resourcepack files. Other files may be hosted as well, however, the purpose is mainly to host the packs to serve sound to users. A port that is port-forwarded must be specified as well as a base directory. It then runs on an async thread while logging out connections (if set to enabled).
